/v1/vpcs/vms/{vm_id}/stop
-----------------------------------------------------------

.. contents::

POST /v1/vpcs/vms/**{vm_id}**/stop
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Stop a VPCS instance

Parameters
**********
- **vm_id**: UUID for the instance

Response status codes
**********************
- **400**: Invalid VPCS instance UUID
- **404**: Instance doesn't exist
- **204**: Instance stopped
